Entry.JapaneseText: いないってよ こいつ→<Unk17:38dc04>

Entry.EnglishText: Come stay at the Silent Night!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… <Tytree>は海岸だよ…… 行かなくて……いいの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... <Tytree> is at the coast. Don't you... have to go see him?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール平原に 雪の積もった跡があったって 言うヤツがいたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: There was a guy who said there were snow tracks on the Minal Plains...

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬鹿言っちゃいけないよな、 この辺りは雪どころか、 雨も降らないんだからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I told him, "Don't be silly, it doesn't even rain around here, let alone snow."

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、ガジュマの子が、 街の下の方へスゴイ勢いで 走ってったぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: A while ago, I saw a Gajuma kid sprinting through this area at a breakneck speed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、何をやらかしたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What in the world must've happened?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ……！ ガジュマが……!!
<Blue>幻の島<White>？ あんたら、船持ってるか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>? Well, do you guys have a boat?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、そいつに乗って 探した方が早くはないか？
Entry.EnglishText: So wouldn't it be quicker to get on that thing and find out for yourselves?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ……！ ガジュマが……!!
なんか知らないけど、 すごくむかつくんだよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what it is, but a certain someone really disgusts me.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、すまん…… あんたにじゃなく、 ガジュマのヤツらだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, sorry... I was referring to that Gajuma, not you.
I wonder why I'm feeling like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとは かかわりたくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want anything to do with Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があってもヒューマが悪い、 ヒューマのせい、なんだとさ。
Entry.EnglishText: "No matter what happens, Huma are bad, it's the Huma's fault," they said.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのヤツら、 自分たちだけで、この街を 作ったみたいな顔しやがって……
Entry.EnglishText: All of the Gajuma here act like they built this city all by themselves.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここ港町ミナールは 潮騒の街。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the port town of Minal, also known as the City of Tidal Waves.

Entry.JapaneseText: そしてアカデミックな 一面もあるんだぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: And there's even an academic side to it, too.

Entry.JapaneseText: その答えが知りたきゃ、 役場へ行ってみな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you want to know more, head to the Town Hall.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ……!! 一体、何の音だ……!?
Entry.EnglishText: What the? What the hell is this sound!?

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい地鳴りだったな…… 何が起こったのか、そのうち 正式な発表はあると思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: That was a hell of an earth tremor... I'm sure there will be an official statement soon about what happened.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは、屋内に 隔離する事になった。
おまえの連れのヒューマたちも どこか建物内に入るよう言え。
Entry.EnglishText: Tell your Humas to stay inside a building somewhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間対立を避けるため、 現在、ヒューマの外出は 禁止している。
Entry.EnglishText: In order to avoid interracial conflicts, all Huma must stay indoors at all times.

Entry.JapaneseText: すみやかに屋内に入れ。
大地の怒りだ……！ おそろしい、 おそろしい……
Entry.EnglishText: The wrath of the lands!! It's horrible, just horrible...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはヒューマと 一緒にいるべきではない！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma shouldn't stick together with Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: いずれ、おまえらの間で 争いが起こるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sooner or later, there's going to be a fight between you guys.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出禁止だ。
旅の者とて同様。 宿屋内か、さもなければ 街の外へ出ていけ。
Entry.EnglishText: The same applies to you travelers. Either take shelter at the inn, or leave the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴り…… 東の方からだな……
Entry.EnglishText: This ground tremor... It's coming from the east.

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき伝令からラジルダが なくなったという 知らせがあったが……
Entry.EnglishText: I just got word that Razilda is gone...

Entry.JapaneseText: なくなるって…… どういう事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: It just... disappeared... What does this mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは外に 出ていてもかまわないが……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if Gajuma are wandering outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっちのヒューマだけは どこか屋内に閉じ込めておけよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Just keep your Huma selves indoors somewhere!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出禁止だぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: All Huma are forbidden from being outdoors!
Misha's on the outskirts of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: お願い！ あの子を 助けてあげて……！
Entry.EnglishText: Please! You have to help Misha!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0120> 海岸へ急ぐ 様子を見る
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0120> Head to the Coast Wait and see

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く、早く止めないと…… あの子……
Entry.EnglishText: W-we have to stop him... Please... That boy...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0120> 海岸へ急ぐ 様子を見る
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0120> Head to the Coast Wait and see

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000062>早く<Veigue>のところへ!! 海岸よ!!
うちの息子なら 平気ですよ。
あんな事があったのに、 最近、ずいぶん元気になって……
Entry.EnglishText: After everything that happened, I've been feeling much better lately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今はそこの宿屋でお世話に なってるんです。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm currently staying at the inn and being taken care of.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダから、 命からがら逃げてきました。
Entry.EnglishText: I fled for my life from Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たち親子に 親切にしてくれた花屋の娘さん…… 無事かしら……
Entry.EnglishText: The daughter of the florist who was so kind to us and our son... I hope she's okay...

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋のおかみさんと バルカ港の方へ行ったみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I think she might have gone with the innkeeper to Balka Harbor.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000000><Blue>王の盾<White>の連中が首都に行くなら、 ここから船に乗るんだな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000000>If the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> are going to the capital, they would have taken a ship from here, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000002>早くこの娘を医者に預けて、 オレたちも船に乗ろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000002>Then let's hurry and get her to a doctor so that we can catch one too.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000003>うん。 まずは、お医者さんを 探さなくっちゃネ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000003>Right. We'll have to find us a doctor first though.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000005>具合の悪い連れがいるんだ。 どこかに医者はいないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000005>We have a companion who is unwell. Do you know where we could find a doctor for her?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000006>それは大変!! すぐにキュリア先生に 診てもらったほうがいいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000006>Oh, how awful! You should take her to see Doctor Curia right away.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000008>この街いちばんのお医者さまです。 ぼくは先生の助手で、 ミーシャっていいます。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000008>She's the best doctor in town. I'm her assistant, Misha.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000009>すぐに先生の所へ 案内してくれ。
<voice:1100000a>先生は今、街を回診中です。 ぼくが呼びに行ってきますから、 皆さんは、そこの宿屋で 待っててください。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100000A>She's currently out on a call. I'll go and get her, so please wait for us at the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100000d>とにかく、 俺たちは宿屋で待とう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100000D>Let's just wait at the inn for now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100008c>お待ちしておりました。 で、お金の準備はできましたか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100008C>I’ve been waiting for you. So, have you procured the agreed upon money?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0120> 準備した ちょっと待ってくれ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0120> We have the money Give us a moment
<voice:1100008D>If it’s money you want, we have it.
<voice:1100008E>Well then, I’ll take your payment now.
<voice:11000090>I can't afford to pay that much.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000091>困りましたね…… では、あり金全部で 手を打ちましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000091>That's too bad. Well, you can just give me all the money you do have.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000093>ちょっと少ないですが、 いいでしょう……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000093>It's not much, but I guess it will do...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>所持金を全て支払いました。
Entry.EnglishText: You gave away all your money.
<voice:11000095>Then helping you is out of the question...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000096>だが、バルカで目的を果たし ここに戻って来た時には オレの持ち物を全部あんたにやる。 売ればそれなりの金にはなるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000096>...But, when I'm finished with what I need to do in Balka, I'll come back here and give you everything I own. You should be able to make some money off of it if you sell it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000097>……わかりました。 その言葉、忘れないでください。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000097>...Understood. Please remember what you've promised me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100009e>待てって言われりゃ待ちますけどね。 早くしねぇと日が暮れちまいますぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100009E>If you need me to wait, then I will wait. But be quick, it's not long until sunset.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100009f>どうしたの、<Veigue>？ やっぱり軍の船にもぐりこむ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100009F>What's going on, <Veigue>? Are we still going to break into a military ship?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000190>……あの子、 気になったから……
<voice:11000191>ミーシャなら 心配いらないってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000191>If you mean Misha, Doctor Curia said he'll be fine.
<voice:11000193>Where are you planning on going from here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000195>俺たちと一緒に行かないか？
<voice:11000196>どういうつもりで そんな事……
<voice:11000197>俺たちの近くにいれば、 俺を殺す機会は いくらでもあるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000197>If you're by my side, you'll have plenty of opportunities to kill me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000199>どうした？ それとも もうバースの仇討ちは 終わりにするのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000199>Well? Have you already given up on your desire for vengeance?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100019a>あなたって…… すごく嫌な人ね。
<voice:1100019c>どうしてさっき、 わたしをかばったりしたの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100019C>Why did you shield me from that attack earlier?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100019d>かばったわけじゃない。 体勢を崩したところに バイラスが飛び込んで来た。 それだけの事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100019D>I wasn't protecting you. My balance was thrown off right as that Virus lunged at you. That's all.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100019f>あなたは本当に…… お父さんを殺したの……？
<voice:110001a0>何度聞いても 答は同じだと思うが？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001A0>Do you think asking the same question will give you a different answer?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001a3>やったぁ！ 仲間が増えたヨ!!
<voice:110001a5>あなたの言う事は信用できない…… お父さんを殺したという その言葉さえ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001A5>I can't trust a word you say. At least not about the death of my father.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001a6>真実がわかるまで、あなたを殺さない。 でももし、あなたが父を殺したと いうのが真実なら……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001A6>Until I know the truth, I won't kill you. But if I find out that you truly are my father's killer...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001a8>……もういい…… 真実かどうかは、わたしが見極める。 だからわたしは、そのために…… あなたと一緒に行く。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001A8>Even so, I will find out the whole truth for myself. For that reason, I will accompany you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001ab>ねえ、<Annie>。 そんなにコワイ顔してると、 <Veigue>みたいになっちゃうよ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001AB>Hey, <Annie>. If you keep it up with that scary glare, you'll end up looking like <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001ac>オレはそんなに恐い顔を しているつもりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001AC>I'm not trying to look scary, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001ad>恐いっていうか、 ネクラなんだよ、<Veigue>は。 だって、全然笑わないんだもん！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001AD>Scary, moody, whatever you'd like to call it. There's never a smile on your face!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001b5>ペトナジャンカへ向かおう。 ここから南西に進んだところにある 工業が盛んな街だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001B5>We should head to Petnadjanka. It's a booming industrial town located south-west of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001b7>奴らが陸路を進んだのなら、 ここから一番近い街は ペトナジャンカだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001B7>If they're traveling by land, Petnadjanka is the closest town.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001b9>うん、<Veigue>の幼なじみの クレアさんがさらわれたんだ。
<voice:110001ba>クレアさんをさらったのは、 <Blue>四星<White>のサレとトーマだ。 ワルトゥも動いている。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001BA>She was taken by Saleh and Tohma of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>. Walto is on the move as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001bd><Blue>四星<White>のひとりだ。 俺は名前ぐらいしか 聞いた事はないが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001BD>She's a member of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>. I only know of her name, however...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001be>キミはミリッツァのコトを どこまで知ってるの？
<voice:110001bf>……わたしも詳しい事は…… <Blue>四星<White>ただひとりの女性で、 とても強いという噂を 聞いた事があるくらい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001BF>Not so much... She's the only woman in the <Blue>Four Stars<White> and she's extremely powerful, or so I've heard.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001c0>きっとそのうち戦うコトに なるんだよネ…… あーあ……気が重いなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001C0>We'll probably have to fight her too eventually...Ugh, this is annoying...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110001c1>……今考えても仕方がない。 まずはペトナジャンカに向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110001C1>There's no use in worrying about that right now. Let's make for Petnadjanka.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>バトルブックに 「属性因子」と 「戦闘用語：陣術」の 説明が追加されました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>In the Battle Book, the "Elemental Attributes" and "Battle Terminology: Glyph Force" entries have been added.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0120>バトルブックを読みますか？ はい いいえ
<voice:3b000000>おい…… なんか街の下の方が 騒がしくねえか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000000>Whoa... Is it me, or does it sound like things are getting heated downtown?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000001>他の街のように、争いが 起きているのかもしれない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000001>There are probably fights breaking out here as well, just like the other cities.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000039>ミーシャが昨日、この街で <Red>クレア<White>に会ったらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000039>Misha said he met <Red>Claire<White> in this city just yesterday!
<voice:3B00003A>You mean to say Agarte was here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00003b>まだこの街にいるかもしれない。
<voice:3b00003c>アガーテが見つかれば、 クレア、おまえも元に戻れる！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00003C>If we find her, then Claire, we should be able to get you back to normal!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000062>海岸の方へ走って行ったわ!! 危険な状態よ!! 早く行ってあげて!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000062>I saw him running toward the coast! The situation is dire! You need to catch up with him immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000b0>陛下がおまえを 助けてくださったんだ。
<voice:3b0000b3>ミルハウストのところだ。 クレアがいる。 あんたのフォルスがあれば……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000B3>I'm taking you to Milhaust, because Claire is with him. If we can use your Force, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000b4>わたくしはもう、フォルスを 使う事ができないのです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000B4>...I'm no longer capable of using my Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000b6>わからない…… 何度も試してみました…… でも、どうやってもフォルスは……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000B6>I do not know. I've attempted to time and time again, and yet no matter what I do...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000b7>……彼女のところへ行っても、 入れ替わる事も……できない…… わたくしには何も……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000B7>Even if you were to take me to her, I do not believe that I would be able to change us back... I can't do anything about it...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000bb>あんたと引き換えなら、 ミルハウストはクレアを 帰してくれるはずだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000BB>Because if I bring you to Milhaust, then he should give Claire back to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000bc>……なぜ、 クレアはあなたのもとを 去ったのですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000BC>...Why is it that she is no longer with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000be>……わたくしが行けば、 あなたのところに 戻ってくるのですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000BE>Are you certain that Claire would return to your side if I were to go with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000bf>クレアは…… クレアがこんな事になったのは、 あんたのせいじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000BF>She'd... The only reason any of this happened to her is because of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000c0>どんな姿をしていても オレはかまわない！ オレがクレアを守ってやらなきゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000C0>I don't care what she looks like! I have to protect her!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000c1>おまえは、 何もわかっちゃいねえ。
<voice:3b0000fb>頼みがある…… スールズに行かせてほしい……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000FB>I have a favor to ask... I'd like to go to Sulz.
<voice:3B0000FD>Is that really okay with you guys?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000fe>行きたいって言ったのは <Veigue>さんですよ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000FE>Aren't you the one who was asking to go?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b0000ff>話したい事があるんでしょ？ ……家族に。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B0000FF>I'm guessing that there's something you'd like to talk to your family about?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000103>陛下……アガーテ様も、 我々と一緒に行きませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000103>Your Majesty... Queen Agarte, would you not mind joining us for this trip?
<voice:3B000104>Huh... Would that truly be all right with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000105>質問に質問で返すのは 感心しませんな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000105>It is impolite to answer a question with another question.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4200007f>あなた……何しに来たの!? ケガ人を増やすつもりなら 帰ってちょうだい！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4200007F>...Just why are you here?! If you plan on causing more casualties, I suggest you get out of here!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:42000080>そんな……先生…… あっしらも手伝いたくて ここに来たんでさぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:42000080>Well actually, Doctor... We've come to help...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:42000082>いやぁ……先生たちや <Veigue>たちを見てたら、 自分が恥ずかしくなっちまって……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:42000082>Well, seeing how you and Veigue and all the others act made us feel like a bunch of lowlifes...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:42000084>ありがとう！ まずは傷の手当てからよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:42000084>...Well, thank you! You can start by helping me dress some wounds!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:42000085>先生、ぼく、ぼく…… うれしいです！
<voice:42000086>みんな、ようやく気づき始めたのよ。 大切なものが何かって事に。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:42000086>It looks like everyone is finally coming to realize what's really important.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:42000087><Veigue>……みんな…… あなたたちのがんばりは 無駄じゃなかったわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:42000087><Veigue>... Everyone... Your efforts were not in vain!

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but Carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:012c>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short of money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:012c> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:012c>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:012c> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
<speed:00><scale:0140><font:80000002>馬車で<Unk18:48180528b80488>に移動します。 料金<nmb:012c>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>To travel to <Unk18:48180528b80488> by Carriage, it'll be <nmb:012c> Gald. Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
